sentences.sContent: ...powerful forces are ideologically opposed to the whole idea of government action on a sufficient scale to jump-start the economy...
...which have each gone ideologically over-board in their own ways...
...Barack Obama assembled a racially and ideologically diverse coalition with his message of hope and change; as the reality of life under a new administration settles in...

words.tran: 意识形态；思想意识；观念学
